includedAssets.title: Decency In The Middle
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep1 - Decency In The Middle
includedAssets.synopsis: Critically-acclaimed Danish political drama. In the run up to the parliamentary election, party leader Birgitte Nyborg makes a shocking decision.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Critically-acclaimed Danish political drama. In the run up to the parliamentary election, party leader Birgitte Nyborg makes a shocking decision.

includedAssets.title: Count To 90
includedAssets.synopsis: After winning the election, Birgitte looks for allies to form a coalition government.

includedAssets.title: The Art of the Possible
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep3 - The Art of the Possible

includedAssets.title: 100 Days
includedAssets.synopsis: Journalist Katrine Fonsmark receives word of a scandal involving illegally detained prisoners.

includedAssets.title: Men Who Love Women
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep5 - Men Who Love Women
includedAssets.synopsis: Birgitte puts forward a bill to enforce gender equality on directors boards, upsetting Denmark's most powerful businessman.

includedAssets.title: State Visit
includedAssets.synopsis: The visit of a former Soviet president makes life difficult for Birgitte when he pressures her to arrest a prominent political activist.

includedAssets.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil, Speak No Evil
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep7 - See No Evil, Hear No Evil, Speak No Evil
includedAssets.synopsis: When it's discovered that a left-wing political party are being illegally monitored, it drives a wedge between Birgitte and her friend, the party leader, Anne Sophie Lindenkrone.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: BAFTA-winning Danish drama following the unexpected appointment of Denmark's first female prime minister, and her battle through her first year in office. In Danish with English subtitles.
